name: Billy Can't Run - VR
description:
Billy Can't Run is a infinite runner where you are the driver of a Billy-Cart racing down the city streets of San Fransisco. In this Google Cardboard VR experience you will dodge cars, pedestrians and trams to make it as far as possible down this procedurally generated city street. 

How to play:

Look left and right to move in that direction. 

Press the button on the Cardboard to jump over obstacles

To restart (After Game Over) -> Look up, tap screen, look down, tap screen (Known bug)
